Intourist is a business hotel located in the centre of Zaporozhye near the Dnieper River. It offers spacious accommodations, a business centre, and free Wi-Fi.

Each room comes equipped with cable TV and a minibar. Rooms at Intourist Hotel also have private bathrooms with hairdryers. Some rooms have large windows and views of Lenin Prospect.

There is also a Ukrainian restaurant and Lobby bar on site. A complimentary buffet breakfast is also provided.

Intourist Hotel is a 12-minute drive from Khortytsia Island. Private and secure parking facilities are available upon request. 

Couples particularly like the location — they rated it 8.3 for a two-person trip. 

We speak your language!

This hotel in the centre of Zaporozhye has free fenced parking and free Wi-Fi. It is a 5-minute walk from Zaporozhye Local History Museum.
 
The rooms at the Soborniy Hotel feature warm colours and large windows. Safety deposit boxes, bathrobes and slippers are provided.
 
Soborniy’s seasonal spa area features a pool and a sauna. Guests can also book massages.
 
Meal delivery is provided upon request. A range of drinks are on offer in the hotel bar.
 
Zaporozhye-2 Train Station is a 10-minute walk from the Soborniy Hotel. 
 
Couples particularly like the location — they rated it 8.6 for a two-person trip.
 
This property is also rated for the best value in Zaporozhye! Guests are getting more for their money when compared to other properties in this city.

Just 100 m from the Magara Theatre, this bright and modern hotel offers a central location in Zaporozhye. Free parking, soundproofed rooms and an international restaurant are featured here.

Teatralniy Hotel’s elegant rooms have rich carpet flooring, a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi.

A buffet breakfast with hot and cold dishes is provided every morning at Teatralniy. International and Ukrainian cuisine is served in the restaurant, and a range of drinks are available at the lobby bar. Breakfast is included in the price.

Guests can reach all parts of the city from Zaporozhye Train Station, a 10-minute walk away. Zaporozhye Airport is 12 km from the hotel, and a shuttle service is available. 

This property also has one of the best-rated locations in Zaporozhye! Guests are happier about it compared to other properties in the area.

 Couples particularly like the location — they rated it 9.0 for a two-person trip.

 This property is also rated for the best value in Zaporozhye! Guests are getting more for their money when compared to other properties in this city.

This property is 4 minutes walk from the beach. Just a 5-minute drive from the Zaporozhye city centre, Khortitsa Palace Hotel features an on-site shop, modern rooms with free Wi-Fi.

All the spacious, air-conditioned rooms have a seating area. Some rooms have a balcony with a city or river view.

The modern Flavours restaurant serves Ukrainian and European cuisine. Drinks can be enjoyed at the 2 bars and on the summer terrace.
\Leisure facilities at Khortitsa Palace Hotel include a sauna, a steam room and a fitness centre. There is a 24-hour reception.

The Bulvar Shevtchenko Bus Stop is a 2-minute walk from the hotel and the railway station is only 20 minutes by car. Airport Zaporozhye is 20 km away.

This property is 12 minutes walk from the beach. Featuring free Wi-Fi and free private parking, this hotel is located in Zaporizhzhya city, 12 minutes walk from the central Prospekt Lenina. It also offers free daily bottle of water in the rooms.
 
Each air-conditioned room at Prague Hotel is decorated in a classic style and includes a fridge. A hairdryer is provided in the bathrooms.

A daily breakfast is served in the dining room of Prague, and several restaurants offering Ukrainian and European cuisines can be found within a 5-minute walk of the hotel.

Zaporizhzhya city centre with the City Park are 7 km from Prague Hotel, while Zaporizhzhya 1 Train Station is 16 minutes drive away. It is 19 km from Zaporizhzhya Airport.

SUNRISE Park offers accommodation in Zaporozhye. The hotel has a children's playground and terrace, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and free private parking is available on site. 

 Every room is equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Each room comes with a private bathroom with a bath or shower and bidet, with slippers and free toiletries provided. 

 There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Banquet facilities, a seasonal terrace and a hookah lounge are featured. Bike hire is also available. 

 Zaporizhia Airport is 13 km away. Zaporizhia Train Station is 11 km from the property.
